data.text: @titwh Hola , thank you for contacting us, we have replied your DM with all details, we'll continue through that channel. Regards
@BrieFreeAgain Hola, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM , we'll continue through that channel. Regards
@Mary_Linam Hola Mary, thank you for contacting us, we have replied your DM, we'll continue through that channel. Regards
@kiithic Hola Carla, thank you for contacting us, we have replied your DM requesting for your booking information, we'll continue through that channel. Kind regards :)

@corotalyst Hola, we do not have a channel enabled different from our web form, so we could not credit you with this data. At the moment we remain attentive to the news of our colleagues in the area in charge, regards.

@corotalyst Hola, in this case we should be able to ask our claims colleagues for an alternative for your case. Once they give us an answer we should be able to accredit it by this same means, regards.
@jdhspkwa Hello, Julie. As we indicated through the MD you sent us. We have requested news of your case from the area in charge, we hope to have an answer as soon as possible. Kind regards.

data.text: @IndyFlint Hello. Please send us an MD with your reservation code and ticket number (075-23********). We will be attentive to your response. Kind regards.

@johnsads Hola John. Could you please, provide us with your booking code via DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa), email address, and name as it appears on the booking, and ticket numbers so that we can review it? Regards.

@costaballena_ Hello. Thanks for writing to us. At the time of making the reservation we always indicate which plane will operate the flight. If you have any additional questions, please let us know. Kind regards.
@Matthew432112 Hello. We have responded to your query through a direct message. Kind regards.
@psha85 Hola, could you send us a DM with your booking code, full name, ticket number (075...) and more details about your query? https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@marcemouse_pad Thanks :)
@marcemouse_pad Please delete the booking details from this public tweet and avoid posting this kind of info on public chats. You should send us a DM instead: https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

data.text: @marcemouse_pad Hola Marcela. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@JoeChiang1209 Hola Joseph, we're sorry for the inconvenience and have just replied your DMs. Please check

@keloram Hola Kelly, we are sorry you feel this way, like we have explained to your before, our prices can vary depending on the seat and fare availability, sorry that we cannot inform you any different, regards.
@zeevs Hola, we have responded to your DM, best regards.
@Naginon79 Hola, we have responded your DM, we will continue with the communications there, best regards.

@_Eldog_ Hola, ¿Te has asegurado de encontrarte dentro de las 24 horas previas a tu vuelo de salida? Déjanos saber mas detalles del inconveniente que has tenido por MD. Saludos. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE
@LokyinChin Hola William, we have responded to your DM, regards.
@MisterNibs Hola Chris, was your booking made with us through our web? Please give us more details of the incident, regards.

@jdhspkwa Hola Julie, we are unaware of what may have caused this situation, we understand the frustration that this may bring to you and we are making sure that the appropriate department is looking into the situation, best regards.
@ErinEli48485087 Hola Erin, in principle we always suggest you verify the requirements of the city you’re flying to with the appropriate authorities. How can we help you with your situation?

@RingGrant Hola Grant, we are unaware of what may have caused this situation, please send us your booking code, full name and ticket number via Dm so we can look into your case and help you, best regards.
@SilverBat108 Hola Maria, we have replied to your DM, we will continue the communication that way, regards.
@adammazrani1 Hola Adam, we have given you an answer via DM, regards.
@adammazrani1 We have answered to your DM, Adam.

@FaulknerLJ Hola Jo. What error do you receive when trying to check-in online? Did you receive the proper record locator from BA to complete your check-in process with us?
Regards
@GlamFoodieZA You're welcome :D
@DiegoFer892 Hola Diego. Hemos respondido a tus MD's. Por favor lee nuestros comentarios acerca de tu consulta. Quedamos a disposición. Saludos.

@GlamFoodieZA We hope you enjoyed your flight with us using our in-flight entertainment experience. :)
Safe travels!
@BrieFreeAgain We have not received your PIR number through DM yet. We remain at your disposal once you may provide us with the information requested. Regards
@kathrynhaycock Hola Kathryn. We have answered to your DM. Regards
@BrieFreeAgain Hola. We have replied to your previous tweet. Regards

data.text: @senoraziegler You're welcome :)
@giuseppericci_ Hola Giuseppe. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@senoraziegler within the last 9 months, otherwise you'll need to present a PCR negative test. For more details, please contact the spanish embassy or consulate. Kind regards

@senoraziegler Hola Haylee, in order to travel from the USA to Spain, you need to present your US covid-19 vaccination card with two doses (one if it's Janssen) or the booster shot (3 doses, or 2 if one is from Janssen). Notice that the last shot must have been taken/1

data.text: @KeithCh07623448 Hola Keith, sorry for the inconvenience. In case you still need any further assistance, please send us a DM with your full name, booking code and ticket number (075...) https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@NLCStweets We've just replied your DMs. We'll contact the relevant department and get back to you as soon as we have an update
@NLCStweets Hola, sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with more details about your query https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@AndrewmJessop Hola Andrew. Sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name, ticket number and the reference number related to the upg payment (07555...) https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@kabu_swe We'll contact the claims department and get back to you via DM as soon as we have an update. Sorry for the inconvenience

@mruzga17 Hola, sorry to read this. Please clear all cookies from the browser's memory cache or try again with a different browser or device:  https://t.co/zLqj7mnP0E . Using our mobile app might help as well

data.text: @byrondramos_ Hola Byron, we replied to your messages. Regards.
@MrsD_lovesTea Hola, sorry for the delay. We've replied your DMs
@brittany_kulick Hola, we replied your DM. Regards.
@GeorgeForth You're welcome, George. Kind regards

@GeorgeForth Hola George, we recommend that you travel with the ashes onboard instead of putting the urn into your checked luggage, but, yes, you can travel with it in the hold luggage if you prefer. But notice that it's safer to bring the ashes onboard in a sealed container. Best regards
@kabu_swe Hola William, we can´t block the numbers, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@patchys_1 Hello Patch, could you send us the details by  DM? Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@HannahM96345846 Hola Hannah, Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Delfisanta Revisamos Delfi y continuamos por DM. Saludos
@2teach_edtech Hola Jenna, we are sorry for our delayed response, we have replied your DM with all details, we'll continue through that channel. Regards

@stratfordjones Hola, thank you for contacting us, we have replied your DM requesting for your booking information in order to verify the information of your included baggage, we'll await for your response through that channel. Regards
@chefhankt Hola Hank,  we have requested for your PIR and claim information by DM  before, we'll await for your response through that channel. Regards
@s_camaj Hola, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM requesting for details, we'll continue through that channel. Regards
@PrincessDuggan Hola, we are sorry the delay in giving you an answer, in this case we should be able to request with our colleagues news in your case. We appreciate your patience, regards.
@JoanaROpereira Hola Joana. If you are the claimer, please send us a DM with all the information you consider we need to know, so that we can review it. Regards.

@kris10naps Hola Kristin, we are sorry for the delay in replying to your messages. We would like you to credit us with the data corresponding to your claim by DM to carefully review and give you a better answer, regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@dconn199 Hola, we have read your comments and we are glad that you had a pleasant experience on your trip. We are at your disposal for any questions or inconveniences, Kind regards.

@s_camaj Hola, we would like to know if you have been able to contact our luggage colleagues, we understand that if in the following 48 hours you have not been able to receive updates it is important that you indicate us to review alternatives from social networks, regards.

@saralexandra12 Hola Sara, in this case for security reasons, we will need the claim holder to send us from her account the data about her case so in that way we can verify if we can provide additional assistance. Regards

data.text: @MTophamLS Hola Michelle, we only follow the requirements from the spanish authorities. Although the restrictions were lifted, the mask is still mandatory on flights to/from Spain. For further information, please contact the spanish embassy or consulate. Best regards

@cowboycork Hola, if you bought the tickets directly at https://t.co/m6fyDz8alC, please send us a DM with your full name, the flight date, time and destinations. In case you have the booking reference code, we need it as well https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

data.text: @MrsD_lovesTea Thanks
@BrieFreeAgain We're deeply sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name and PIR reference number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@jdhspkwa Thanks. We've just replied it. Please check
@jdhspkwa Sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name? https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@MrsD_lovesTea Thanks. We've replied your DM. Please check
The pin is then removed and shown to the pilot. This is the signal that it's safe to initiate the flight👋 (3/3) https://t.co/yxXqjBNX5b
It's a device that bypasses or blocks the hydraulic system steering on the nose landing gear so the ground crew can move the aircraft with the tractor during pushback (2/3)
Have you ever seen the bypass pin through the window of one of our aircraft? 👀 (1/3)
@AdamKhavia Hola Adam, sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@MrsD_lovesTea Hola, sorry to read this. Could you please send us a DM with more details? https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@miguel_cabeza Hola Miguel, the prices depend of the demand and availability, that is why the prices change. Regards.
@WHUGIRL Hola Janet, please send us the PIR code, your complete name and your full contact details by DM. Thank you.

@LefterisJP Hola, please clear the browser's memory cache or check again with a different browser or device. Notice that our prices vary according to the demand and seat availability, among other factors. If you need further assistance, please send us a DM https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@glcorbett We're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and appreciate your feedback. Apologies
